thread.title: Connected Vehicle Applications: Safety

title: Connected Vehicle Applications: Safety
text: 173127 Connected Vehicle Applications: Safety The U.S. Department of Transportation has released a fact sheet that describes the connected vehicle safety applications are being designed to reduce or eliminate crashes through data transmissions that are vehicle-to-infrastructure, vehicle-to-vehicle, and vehicle-to-pedestrian.   9/3/2015
